OrgName.entry: SHEFFIELD COMMITTEE TO DEFEND ASYLUM SEEKERS

Desc.entry: A campaigning organisation opposed to any scapegoating of asylum seekers. Supports groups campaigning for individuals and families of asylum seekers who are unjustly threatened with deportation. Campaigns for asylum seekers to have a right to work, have entitlement to income support, for detention centres to be abolished, for the defence of the 1951 Geneva convention, for an end to dispersal, for full legal rights and representation, and for an end to the asylum and immigration act. Please see the website for events, meetings and campaigns.
